text: Ronnie and Donnie Galyon (October 28, 1951 - July 4, 2020) were American conjoined twins. They held the record for the oldest conjoined twins in the world. They were on a reality show The World's Oldest Coinjoined Twins. Ronnie and Donnie Galyon were born on October 28, 1951 in Dayton, Ohio. They shared organs, so they could not be separated.Conjoined twin brothers have shared public private life They almost died when they suffered a blood clot. They lived in Dayton, Ohio.
